member.name: NMDATETIMEWMKEYDOWNA
member.summary: Carries information used to describe and handle a DTN_WMKEYDOWN notification code.

member.name: NMDATETIMEWMKEYDOWNA.nmhdr
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the notification code.

member.name: NMDATETIMEWMKEYDOWNA.nVirtKey
member.summary: A virtual key code that represents the key that the user pressed.

member.name: NMDATETIMEWMKEYDOWNA.pszFormat
member.summary: A zero-terminated substring, taken from the format string, that defines the callback field. The substring is one or more "X" characters, followed by a NULL.

member.name: NMDATETIMEWMKEYDOWNA.st
member.summary: A structure containing the current date and time from the DTP control. The owner of the control must modify the time information based on the user's keystroke.
